description:
On those days that the trails are too cold for tights, but you really want to wear tights, throw these fleece shorts overtop and amp up the cozy. Made from a soft and warm recycled fleece, the Mitja II shorts add warmth where you need it most.

  • Made using Repreve® recycled polyester, 12 PET bottles went into these shorts
  • Polartec® Thermal Pro® fleece dries quickly and holds onto your hard-earned warmth
  • Mechanical stretch is woven into the fleece, letting the shorts move with you
  • Zippered right pocket and open left pocket, giving you one secure spot and one easy access
name: Indyeva Mitja II Shorts - Women's
